translation.en: [woman] Ladies and Gentlemen of the jury,
my client demands that the scales of justice be tipped in his favor.
translation.zh:
‎我的委托人要求
‎正义的天平要偏向于他

translation.en: Ladies and gentlemen of the jury,
it is time to rip off the blindfold
and let justice see.
Sorry, honey, you were really on a roll, but I got court in ten, so...
translation.zh:
‎抱歉 宝贝 你真的顺风顺水
‎但我十分钟后要上庭了 所以…

translation.en: I am liking that second version.
Thanks! [chuckles]  I should use the basement ladies' room more often.
translation.zh:
‎嘿 谢谢 我应该多利用
‎地下室的女厕所

translation.en: It's where all the magic happens.
[woman] These were supposed to be Jerome Johnson's golden years.
translation.zh: ‎这本该是杰罗姆·约翰逊的黄金岁月

translation.en: A widower, starting to date again.
translation.zh: ‎一名鳏夫 又开始约会了

translation.en: Crossing items off his bucket list,
translation.zh: ‎心愿单上的事项也在一个个完成

translation.en: like zipping around town on one of those hip electric scooters.
translation.zh: ‎比如骑着电动摩托车在城里飞驰

translation.en: What was not on his list was a broken hip
from being sideswiped by a city bus on Pike Street.
translation.zh:
‎在派克街被一辆公共巴士撞
‎造成髋部骨折

translation.en: The Seattle Transit Authority thwarts victims
translation.zh: ‎西雅图交通管理局打压受害者

translation.en: from pursuing damages by overwhelming them
translation.zh:
‎他们用令人困惑
‎毫无休止的繁文缛节

translation.en: with confusing, endless, bureaucratic red tape.
They count on justice to turn a blind eye.
But it is time
to rip off the blindfold
and let justice see.
You saved my heinie in there, kid.
translation.zh: ‎你挽救了我的屁屁 孩子

translation.en: I'll find a way to pay you back.
-I promise. -Don't worry about it.
Just get home safe.
All right.
Nah, I ghosted her. She gone.
translation.zh: ‎不 我跟她断绝了联系 她走了

translation.en: Nothing but net.
Excuse me, you... um...
-Hey, sis! How'd it go? -Hey.
translation.zh:
‎-嘿 妹妹 情况如何？
‎-嘿

translation.en: Score one for the good guys.
-[sighs] Congrats. -Thank you.
Want to come over and celebrate? Gideon's teaching Oliver to make pizza.
translation.zh:
‎想要过来庆祝吗？
‎吉迪恩正在教奥利弗做披萨

translation.en: We might be ordering that pizza.
Uh... you know, I would. But I'm just kinda beat,
translation.zh:
‎你知道 我想来
‎但我就是非常累

translation.en: and I got a full inbox calling my name, so, rain check?
translation.zh:
‎我的收件箱都满了
‎所以改天好吗？

translation.en: Game night Friday.
Yes, definitely.
Monopoly money's the only kind I'm going to be seeing this week.
translation.zh:
‎这周《大富翁》里的钞票
‎是我唯一能看见的钱

translation.en: -See ya. -Bye!
-I'm ordering Domino's! -[Gideon] Ooh, That's smart.
translation.zh:
‎-我预定达美乐比萨了
‎-明智的决定

translation.en: [man on radio] Good morning, Seattle. The forecast is rain, rain,
translation.zh: ‎早上好 西雅图 ‎天气预告就是雨啊雨 没错 更多的雨

translation.en: and, yep, more rain.
translation.zh: ‎天气预告就是雨啊雨 没错 更多的雨

translation.en: And now it's time for the KNVB radio traffic report.
translation.zh: ‎现在请收听KNVB电台的交通报道

translation.en: [woman] Okay.
No, Ms. Kapoor, just, just slow down.
translation.zh: ‎不 卡普小姐 说慢一点

translation.en: Okay, what's happening?
No, your landlord can not put a padlock on your front door.
translation.zh:
‎不 你的房东
‎不能在你的前门上装挂锁

translation.en: Double espresso for Nick. Pumpkin spice latte for Susan.
translation.zh:
‎尼克的双倍浓缩咖啡
‎苏珊的南瓜拿铁

translation.en: Yes. Yes, I'm sure.
Yes. No, I don't care what the notice says.
translation.zh: ‎对 不 我不在乎通知上怎么写

translation.en: I'm positive.
And it's not just immoral, by the way, it's illegal.
translation.zh: ‎这不仅仅是不道德 而且是违法的

translation.en: Yes. All right, well I'm gonna get into it with his lawyer
translation.zh: ‎对 好的 等我一回到办公室

translation.en: -as soon as I'm back at the office. -[sighs]
translation.zh: ‎我们会跟他的律师谈这件事

translation.en: Yes. I'm so sorry this is happening, you know, it's not--
translation.zh:
‎对 我很抱歉发生这种事
‎你知道 这不是…

translation.en: -Oh. -I'm so sorry, I just didn't see you.
translation.zh: ‎真是对不起 我没看见你

translation.en: Guess they forgot to patch me in.
translation.zh: ‎我想他们忘记把我加入对话中了

translation.en: Okay.
No, I'm still here.
Yes, I will call you as soon as I can.
[Nick] You know it's a scam, right?
What?
Pumpkin spice latte. No pumpkin in it.
translation.zh: ‎南瓜拿铁 里面根本没有南瓜

translation.en: -Just pumpkin flavoring. -Hmm.
Every fall, the coffee industry acts like
translation.zh: ‎每年秋天 咖啡行业表现地好像

translation.en: some bountiful pumpkin harvest just came in,
so they can peddle their drinks to the masses.
translation.zh: ‎所以他们可以向大众兜售他们的饮品

translation.en: You're drinking a lie.
Why are you still talking to me?
I dunno, we're walking in the same direction?
translation.zh: ‎我没有 我们去的是同一个方向吗？

translation.en: Better to make conversation than have awkward silence, right?
translation.zh:
‎比起尴尬的沉默
‎聊天不是更好吗 对不？

translation.en: This is neither. This is an awkward conversation.
translation.zh: ‎不是这样 这是尴尬的聊天

translation.en: Well... then it's both.
-Can I help you with something? -The door? I have a 9 a.m. appointment.
translation.zh:
‎-你到底有什么事？
‎-是这个门？我有9点的预约

translation.en: -Welcome to Whitaker and Associates. -Thank you.
translation.zh:
‎-欢迎来惠特克联合律师事务所
‎-谢谢

translation.en: [both] Congratulations!
[Nick] Okay...
Where's the water cooler going?
The wave was part celebration, part smoke screen.
translation.zh:
‎我们做人浪部分为了恭喜
‎部分是障眼法

translation.en: Turns out, pro bono is Latin for tap water.
translation.zh:
‎原来公益服务的拉丁语
‎是自来水的意思

translation.en: If you're gonna work for free, I have to make budget cuts.
translation.zh:
‎如果你还是接官司不收费
‎我必须削减预算

translation.en: -[man 2] Buh-bye. -Buh-bye.
Bye.
-Hello. -[shopkeepers bell chimes]
Is it my birthday?
You must be Nick Evans. Nick is your 9 a.m..
translation.zh:
‎你肯定是尼克·埃文斯
‎尼克是你9点钟的客户

translation.en: This is awkward.
So... how can I help you, Mr. Evans?
translation.zh: ‎那么要我怎么帮你 埃文斯先生？

translation.en: I need a lawyer.
And you have a reputation of being one of the classiest
translation.zh: ‎城里在公交车座椅上宣传的律师中

translation.en: bus bench lawyers in town.
Never done a bus bench ad.
translation.zh: ‎我从来没在公交座椅上做过广告

translation.en: Oh, I'm sorry, what is it?
Is it ambulance chaser? Is that what it's called?
translation.zh: ‎冷血讼棍律师？是这么称呼吗？

translation.en: -Civil litigator works fine. -[Nick] Civil litigator.
That's cool. Alright, well, how much you charge?
translation.zh: ‎很酷 好的 你收费多少？

translation.en: -Let's talk about your complaint first. -[Nick] Right.
I want to sue Love Guaranteed.
-The dating website? -[Nick] Mm-hm.
Okay. Were you threatened on a date?
translation.zh: ‎好的 你在约会时受到威胁了吗？

translation.en: Stalked? Harmed?
Worse. I'm a victim of fraud.
-Sorry? -Love Guaranteed is robbing people
of 29.95 a month
translation.zh: ‎“你会找到爱 保证”的旗号

translation.en: with their slogan, "You'll find love, guaranteed."
translation.zh:
‎每个月从每名用户那里
‎抢劫29.95美元

translation.en: Well, I've been on 986 different dates,
and not one of them has provided me love.
translation.zh: ‎没有一次向我证明爱的存在

translation.en: Nine hundred and eighty-six dates with...
actual human women?
Yes, the user agreement fine print states that
translation.zh: ‎对 用户协议的附属细则称

translation.en: a subscriber must go on 1000 different dates for the guarantee to apply.
translation.zh:
‎一名用户必须进行1000次
‎不同的约会才能获得保证

translation.en: Their lawyers clearly thought no one would go through with it, but...
translation.zh:
‎他们的律师显然觉得
‎没人能做到 但是…

translation.en: I did! [chuckles]
Well, home stretch anyways, I got like a dozen to go.
translation.zh:
‎反正进入冲刺阶段了
‎我还有差不多12次

translation.en: Yeah, I'm just...
still a little in the weeds
on this whole 986 dates of it all.
Uh... how is that even possible?
It's a great question. Uh, breakfast, lunch, and dinner dates.
translation.zh: ‎问得好 早餐 午餐和晚餐约会

translation.en: -That's how I do it [sighs]. -Okay.
Guy's gotta eat, right?
Did it ever occur to you that maybe
love was never found because no woman wants to hear
translation.zh:
‎你永远找不到真爱
‎因为没有女人想听到

translation.en: "Guy's gotta eat, right"?
I'm not saying it at the date. I'm not like, "Hey, guy's gotta eat."
translation.zh:
‎我约会的时候不会这么说
‎我不会说：“嘿 人总得吃饭”

translation.en: I'm not doing that, that's not what I'm doing. I'm thinking it in my head.
translation.zh:
‎我不会那么说
‎我没那么说过 我就在心里想

translation.en: Look, the point is, I have a case.
translation.zh: ‎听我说 问题是 我有个官司

translation.en: Okay, a winnable case.
I didn't pass the bar yesterday.
[whispering] I know what this is.
[whispering] What is it?
This is a classic "gotcha" lawsuit.
Find a loophole, take the easy cash.
Think what you want, but Love Guaranteed
translation.zh: ‎想想你要什么 但恋爱保证

translation.en: is profiting off the lonely souls of the world.
translation.zh: ‎利用世界上孤独的灵魂赚钱

translation.en: It is not right.
It is reckless endangerment of the human heart
and I will not stand for it.
[chuckles] The human heart! Right.
It's good.
So, how much for a retainer?
Let me review the merits of your case first.
translation.zh: ‎首先我要对你的官司价值进行评估

translation.en: Go ahead. Don't take too long.
Pretty sure your team
would like the return of their water cooler.
[Denise] How'd it go?
Someone looks like they could use a cocktail.
translation.zh: ‎有些人看起来可以喝杯鸡尾酒

translation.en: -[Susan] It's 9:15. -Never stopped me.
translation.zh:
‎-现在才9点15分
‎-永远无法阻止我

translation.en: Oh. What else we got?
[Roberto] Bills, bills,
and oh hey, look, more bills.
Mr. Bahar wants to defer payment another month.
translation.zh: ‎巴哈尔先生想再延期一个月付款

translation.en: And there's a scary-looking envelope from the landlord.
translation.zh: ‎房东寄来一个看起来很吓人的信封

translation.en: But I did put a Bed Bath and Beyond coupon in there, so it's not all bad news.
translation.zh:
‎但我的确准备一些
‎家居商城优惠券 所以不全是坏消息

translation.en: -You're doing the Lord's work, Denise. -Thank you.
translation.zh:
‎-你是在做上帝的工作 丹妮丝
‎-谢谢

translation.en: He's raising the rent.
-Again. -[Denise] It's just a hiccup.
We'll be fine.
Say something.
Is our goldfish okay?
He's sleeping.
He's sleeping?
[sighs] She can read me like a book.
Why do I have a feeling I'm going to be seeing you in court some day?
translation.zh:
‎为什么我感觉有一天
‎我会看见你上法庭呢？

translation.en: -Okay. -How you feeling?
-[sighs] I'm dying and everything hurts. -Aw, buddy.
translation.zh:
‎-我要死了 全身都疼
‎-哦 好姐妹

translation.en: Where's my glowing? You know, I was promised glowing.
translation.zh:
‎我的容光焕发哪里去了？
‎有人保证我会容光焕发

translation.en: -You look great. -I'm fat.
But you're the really good kind of fat, you know?
translation.zh:
‎但你看起来真的是很健康的胖
‎你知道吗？

translation.en: Like a little avocado.
Excuse me while I drop my decaf in slow motion.
translation.zh:
‎我用慢动作放下我的脱咖啡因咖啡
‎你可别介意

translation.en: A dating site?
It's for a case.
Wow, you are so taking this case.
translation.zh: ‎哇 你这么接到这个官司的

translation.en: No, he's the client.
-A hot client. -Gross client.
Hot gross client.
Obnoxious, gross, hot only to a certain desperate kind of woman
translation.zh:
‎讨厌 恶心
‎只有某些绝望的女人觉得火辣的客户

translation.en: who is not me, still perspective client.
translation.zh: ‎反正还在审查客户的我不觉得

translation.en: -[Gideon] Hey, everybody! -[boy] Woo-hoo
-Daddy! -Who wants Ben and Jerry's?
[mouthing] Not in front of the kid, or we have to share.
translation.zh:
‎别再孩子面前说
‎否则我们必须分享

translation.en: -Share what? -Nothing! Buddy, come here.
translation.zh:
‎-分享什么？
‎-没什么 小子 过来

translation.en: -He's still wearing his dinner. -[Gideon] Yes, I see that.
translation.zh:
‎-他身上还残留着晚饭
‎-是的 我看见了

translation.en: Okay, bath time, kiddo. Come on.
translation.zh: ‎好吧 洗澡了 儿子 快点

translation.en: High-five your Auntie Susan good night.
Nice buddy. Night!
What did you eat exactly?
My brother-in-law might be an actual saint.
translation.zh: ‎我姐夫可能是个真正的圣人

translation.en: Hmm. Saint Gideon did not miraculously fall from the sky
translation.zh:
‎圣吉迪恩
‎并没有像冰冻的飞机马桶水一样

translation.en: like frozen airplane toilet water.
You know how we met?
-Yes, I know, online dating. -Mm-hm.
Can you believe this guy's been on almost a thousand dates?
translation.zh:
‎你相不相信
‎这家伙马上要完成1000次约会了？

translation.en: -Are you serious? -He's a classic loophole shark.
translation.zh:
‎-你说真的吗？
‎-他是个钻空子的老手

translation.en: He's exploiting this company over a tiny detail in the fine print.
translation.zh: ‎他在公司细则的一个小细节上做文章

translation.en: -Interesting case. -Ridiculous case.
I mean, my mission is to help the helpless.
translation.zh: ‎我是说 我的任务是帮助无助的人

translation.en: He's not helpless. He's shameless.
-Shameless pays the bills. -[sighs]
It would mean that my employees could stop job hunting.
translation.zh: ‎也就是说我的雇员不用去找工作

translation.en: Roberto left his laptop open with his resume there.
translation.zh:
‎罗伯托的电脑开着
‎简历就显示在屏幕上

translation.en: I fixed a typo.
Of course you did.
-[Nick] Hello? -Mr. Evans, hi, it's Susan Whitaker.
translation.zh:
‎-喂？
‎-埃文斯先生 嗨 我是苏珊·惠特克

translation.en: We can start tomorrow.
[Susan] Okay, team.
The first thing we need to do is take a deep dive
translation.zh: ‎我们首先要做的是深入了解

translation.en: into the strange and prolific dating life of Mr. Nicholas Evans.
translation.zh:
‎尼古拉斯·埃文斯先生
‎奇怪又丰富的约会生活

translation.en: Finally a fun case.
This case is not going to be a walk in the park.
translation.zh: ‎这个官司不会是轻松愉快的活

translation.en: Love Guaranteed is owned by none other
translation.zh: ‎恋爱保证的拥有者不是别人

translation.en: than Tamara Taylor.
[chuckles] We just won big time.
I'm sorry, Tiffany what now?
Tamara Taylor, the lifestyle guru
translation.zh: ‎塔玛拉·泰勒 那位生活方式大师

translation.en: who tells women to eat nothing but soaked almonds and to steam their...
translation.zh:
‎让女人只吃泡过的杏仁
‎然后蒸她们的…

translation.en: I'm caught up.
She is Forbes 500-level loaded, meaning she is going to be lawyered up.
translation.zh:
‎她是福布斯500强富豪
‎也就是说她会请律师

translation.en: Our case has to be airtight.
You know, I'm looking forward to taking on Love Guaranteed.
translation.zh:
‎你们知道
‎我一直期待着会一会恋爱保证

translation.en: Hi, Roberto, accounting.
Are you about to do the big speech?
Because if this is the big speech, I have to use the restroom first.
translation.zh:
‎如果如果你那么做
‎我必须先用洗手间

translation.en: All those corporate fat cats
and their $200 haircuts and their fancy watches.
translation.zh:
‎和他们价值200美元的发型
‎以及他们的名表

translation.en: They're not even gonna know what hit 'em.
translation.zh: ‎他们甚至不知道被什么打击到

translation.en: I should go, right?
-You should go. -[Susan] No. Okay, sorry.
translation.zh:
‎-你该走了
‎-不 好的 抱歉

translation.en: No big speech. Please, use the restroom. Meeting over.
translation.zh:
‎没有长篇演讲
‎要用洗手间请便 会议结束

translation.en: This is exciting! Standing up for the little guy.
translation.zh: ‎这太让人兴奋了 为小人物发声

translation.en: Online dating can just be so soul crushing.
translation.zh: ‎在线约会就是会让人心灵破碎

translation.en: I wouldn't know. Luckily, I've never tried it.
translation.zh: ‎我不知道 很幸运我从来没尝试过

translation.en: What?
I'm sorry, you've never online dated?
translation.zh: ‎抱歉 你从来没有在网上约会过？

translation.en: No, what's the big deal?
You can't win a case over something you know nothing about.
translation.zh: ‎你对这件事一无所知怎么能打赢官司

translation.en: We need to get you online.
-Mm-hm. -No.
-[chuckling] Yeah! -[Susan] No!
No, I don't have time for dating.
It's not dating!
What if it's research? You know,
it could make the difference between winning or losing this case.
[Susan] What are you about to do here?
-Creating your profile. -I thought you had to pee.
translation.zh:
‎-创建你的档案
‎-我以为你的小便要憋不住了

translation.en: -It can wait. -This is so fun. [laughs]
Okay, fine. But listen, I am proofing it first.
translation.zh:
‎好的 好啊 但听好了
‎要让我先审查一遍

translation.en: Don't make me sound weird.
Don't worry! We got this.
Hey just for fun, what photo were you thinking--
translation.zh:
‎你们开心就好
‎你们考虑用什么照片…

translation.en: [both] Go!
-chuckles] -Oh, I like that.
-[Roberto] Ooh! -[Denise] Right?
-I don't know if men would. -Oh.
It's both helpful and a little bit creepy
that you meticulously documented all of your dates.
translation.zh: ‎你详细记录了所有的约会情况

translation.en: Thank you. [sighs] Figured I'd need a paper trail.
translation.zh: ‎谢谢 我就想着需要纸质的证明

translation.en: The one who talked about cats all night?
Yeah, didn't even own a cat.
The one who brought her parents on the date?
Yeah. She never said a word, but her dad was awesome.
translation.zh: ‎对 她一个字都没说 但她爸很棒

translation.en: I mean, we talked about baseball for hours, it was great.
translation.zh:
‎我们聊了好几个小时的棒球
‎非常的棒

translation.en: I wish I would've got his number.
translation.zh: ‎我希望我当时问他要号码了

translation.en: The one who needed a date to her sister's wedding.
translation.zh:
‎需要对象
‎一起参加她姐姐婚礼的女性？

translation.en: Yeah, two tickets to Hawaii seemed kind of extra for date numero dos.
translation.zh:
‎对 两张去夏威夷的票
‎对于约会备胎来说似乎有点多了

translation.en: The one who got drunk and tried to fight the busboy?
translation.zh: ‎喝醉而且想和服务员打架的女性？

translation.en: For the record? I took the punch.
translation.zh: ‎准确地说 我喝了潘趣酒

translation.en: Okay, Nick, you cannot name these women like they're episodes of Friends.
translation.zh:
‎好的 尼克 你不能用《老友记》
‎剧名的风格给女性取名字

translation.en: It's the only way to keep them apart, you know how many Chloes I've dated?
translation.zh:
‎这是区分她们的唯一办法
‎你知道我跟多少个克洛伊约会过吗？

translation.en: Fourteen!
Plus 12 Emmas and like, half a dozen Zoes.
translation.zh: ‎再加上12个艾玛 还有6个佐伊

translation.en: Okay, little accountability please. You're the one dating in bulk.
translation.zh:
‎好吧 请有点责任感
‎你是那个和很多人约会的人

translation.en: This lawsuit isn't just about me, you know.
translation.zh: ‎你知道 这起官司不仅仅和我有关

translation.en: Love Guaranteed took advantage of them, too.
So what are you gonna do if we win?
translation.zh: ‎如果我们胜诉你打算怎么办？

translation.en: You're gonna split the damages with a thousand different women?
translation.zh:
‎你会跟一千位不同的女性
‎分享赔偿金吗？

translation.en: No, I have plans for that money.
translation.zh: ‎不 这笔钱的用途我有打算

translation.en: I bet you do.
And just so you know, I was always a perfect gentleman to them.
translation.zh:
‎就告诉你 在她们面前
‎我一直是一位完美绅士

translation.en: I took these women on classy dates.
translation.zh: ‎我让这些女士有了优雅的约会

translation.en: Split the check at Denny's?
No disrespect to the Grand Slam Breakfast, but give a guy some credit, okay?
translation.zh:
‎不是说对它的大满贯早饭有意见
‎但要给别人一点信任 好吗？

translation.en: Breakfast at Bacco, lunch at Pink Door, and dinner at Coral.
translation.zh:
‎早饭在八客餐厅 中饭在粉门餐厅
‎晚饭在珊瑚餐厅

translation.en: Coral? That place is fancy.
Yes. And I paid every time.
Alright, I'm impressed.
More with your time management than anything.
Yeah? Got most dates down to under an hour.
translation.zh: ‎是吗？大多数约会都在一小时内

translation.en: Quicker than an oil change.
Okay, do you have a heart,
or just an empty space where you keep your car keys?
translation.zh:
‎或者那个位置是空的
‎你用来放车钥匙？

translation.en: Yeah, it's empty.
-I gotta go. -[Susan] Hot date?
-[Nick] Yep. -What?
That was a bad joke, it's 10 a.m.
translation.zh:
‎那是个拙劣的笑话
‎现在才早上10点

translation.en: Yeah. Breakfast, lunch, and dinner dates.
translation.zh: ‎对 早饭 午饭和晚饭都约会

translation.en: It's breakfast.
[sighs] You poor, poor girls.
I know I'm married, but I'd love to see him in my chambers.
translation.zh:
‎我知道我结婚了
‎但我想在我的房间里看见她

translation.en: For a debriefing.
He's an opportunist.
We should be ashamed for taking this case.
translation.zh: ‎接这个官司我们应该觉得羞耻

translation.en: -[man 2] Hello. -Ain't no shame in this game.
translation.zh:
‎-喂
‎-在这个游戏里一点都不丢人

translation.en: [Denise] Precious cargo coming through!
Ooh, I love our new paying client.
We'll see about that.
-What is that? -[Susan] Files.
From Nick's dates. In order for this case to fly,
translation.zh: ‎尼克的约会资料 ‎为了让这个官司起飞

translation.en: all of them have to be corroborated, so good luck with that.
translation.zh:
‎所有人必须得到证实
‎所以祝你们好运

translation.en: [both] Incoming!
What's going on?
We just went live.
-What are you talking about? -Your inbox for Love Guaranteed.
translation.zh:
‎-你在说什么？
‎-你在恋爱保证上的收件箱

translation.en: You were supposed to let me proof it first!
[exhales deeply] Why would you use that photo?
It was the only picture we could find where you weren't working.
translation.zh:
‎这是我们能找到的
‎唯一一张你没在工作的照片

translation.en: That's from my birthday at Tortilla Flats, I was wasted.
translation.zh:
‎那是我在托提拉弗拉特
‎过生日的照片 烂醉如泥

translation.en: [Roberto] A drink-y Susan is a dateable Susan.
translation.zh: ‎喝醉的苏珊是充满魅力的苏珊

translation.en: [Susan scoffs] I do dip my french fries in mayo.
I do like old dogs better than puppies.
Wait, how do you guys know all this stuff about me?
translation.zh: ‎等等 你们怎么知道我的这些事？

translation.en: -Lots of overtime. -I went through your garbage.
translation.zh:
‎-长时间的加班
‎-我翻看过你的垃圾

translation.en: They're lighting up like planes on a runway.
translation.zh: ‎它们就像跑道上的飞机一样闪闪发光

translation.en: No. No. Maybe.
No, not right now, no.
I have to interview Nick's dates for their depositions.
translation.zh:
‎我必须采访尼克的约会对象
‎拿到证词

translation.en: Which you can do while going on dates of your own. #Research.
translation.zh:
‎你自己约会的时候
‎能做什么 研究

translation.en: Mr. Yang next door is willing to offer you a friends and family lunch discount.
translation.zh:
‎隔壁的杨先生愿意
‎为你提供朋友和家人的午餐折扣

translation.en: I do love Yang's.
He's weirdly as excited as we are.
For research.
Ooh, how about this one in the flannel?
Looks like a lumberjack.
-Like an educated lumberjack. -That's not a thing.
translation.zh:
‎-看起来像是受过教育的伐木工人
‎-没有这种人

translation.en: -A lumbersexual? -Oh, that's a thing.
Uh... hi there. My name's Susan Whitaker,
I'm an attorney in the area.
I was just wondering, did you ever go on a date with Nicholas Evans?
translation.zh:
‎我就是想知道
‎你和尼古拉斯·埃文斯约会过吗？

translation.en: Yes, I remember him. Because he actually looked like his photo.
translation.zh:
‎是的 我记得他
‎因为他跟照片上看起来一样

translation.en: Some dates don't look like their photos?
translation.zh: ‎有些约会对象和照片上不一样？

translation.en: Really?
So how'd the date go?
-It was the best date I've ever been on. -Mm-hm.
Wish he would've asked for my number!
Nick was the best. Just a nice, normal guy.
translation.zh:
‎尼克是最棒的
‎就是个心善的正常小伙

translation.en: Like, super normal.
Some dates are abnormal?
So, intermittent fasting, huh?
Yeah.
As in you just purposely don't eat?
-I'm actually up to 20 hours a day now. -Wow.
isn't that dangerous, or...
No, it's super good for you.
translation.zh: ‎不会 对你的健康很有益处

translation.en: It's actually how...
cavemen used to... to eat.
Wasn't the life expectancy for a caveman like, 25?
translation.zh: ‎穴居人的预期寿命不是只有25岁吗？

translation.en: [plates shattering] Check!
So, tell me about your date with Nick Evans.
translation.zh:
‎所以跟我聊聊
‎你的约会对象尼克·埃文斯

translation.en: The date was fine, but I knew he wasn't for me. I got a vibe.
translation.zh:
‎约会不错 大那我知道他不适合我
‎我能感觉到

translation.en: What kind of a vibe?
It's like Nick believes he's genuinely looking for love.
translation.zh: ‎就是尼克相信 他真的在寻找真爱

translation.en: But instead he's trying to prove that love doesn't exist.
translation.zh: ‎但他一直在努力证明真爱并不存在

translation.en: Did you ever find a date to your sister's wedding?
translation.zh: ‎那你找到人跟你一起参加婚礼了吗？

translation.en: -It was canceled. -Oh.
Turns out the groom's in love with my mom, and not my sister.
translation.zh: ‎结果新郎爱上了我妈 不是我姐姐

translation.en: Could you die?
Wow. Holidays must be interesting at your house.
translation.zh: ‎放假的时候你家肯定很有意思

translation.en: At least Nick showed up.
My last online date totally ghosted me.
translation.zh:
‎我前一个网上约会对象
‎彻底跟我玩失踪

translation.en: Some dates just don't show up?
You guys, I don't know how Nick managed it.
translation.zh: ‎各位 我不知道尼克是怎么做到的

translation.en: I don't.
I've been on two dates and one no-show, and I am exhausted.
translation.zh:
‎我约会了两个人 一个没出现
‎我已经累死了

translation.en: Why do you think I proposed to Dante after two weeks? It's a jungle out there.
translation.zh:
‎你为什么认为两周后
‎我要向丹特求婚？外面是丛林

translation.en: [Denise] There's plenty of fish in the sea. [Roberto] There's also plenty of trash.
translation.zh:
‎-海里的鱼多得是
‎-也有很多垃圾

translation.en: -The affidavits for Nick to sign. -[Susan] I'll drive them over.
translation.zh: ‎要尼克签字的宣誓书 ‎我开车送过去

translation.en: [Denise] I can e-mail them and he can docu-sign.
translation.zh:
‎我可以发电子邮件
‎他可以在网上签

translation.en: Are you kidding me? I'm beyond curious to see where this guy works.
translation.zh:
‎你开玩笑吗？
‎我很好奇这家伙在哪里工作

translation.en: I bet you he's a Crossfit instructor.
Probably runs an illegal poker game out of a parking garage.
translation.zh:
‎也许在停车场外面
‎组织非法的扑克游戏

translation.en: Surprise, you're both wrong.
-[Nick] Let's go, man. -Some might call this elder abuse.
translation.zh:
‎-加油
‎-也许有人认为这是虐待老人

translation.en: -Faster, okay? -Alright. [out of breath]
Once I'm on my feet,
I'm gonna ask Donna over there to go dancing. Hey, Donna.
translation.zh: ‎我要邀请那边的唐娜去跳舞 嘿 唐娜

translation.en: You ever been dipped in an Argentine tango?
Be careful, she's a maneater.
Oh, here's hoping.
Jerome, you nasty.
Wait. What...
What is happening?
My crusader for justice.
Okay, so many things are finally making sense.
translation.zh: ‎好的 所以很多事情最后都说得通了

translation.en: I didn't know you made house calls.
I'm just doing my due diligence.
Right, checking up on me.
-Something like that. -Making sure I'm an upstanding citizen.
translation.zh:
‎-差不多吧
‎-确保我是一个正直公民

translation.en: -And he's making me a standing up citizen. -[chuckles]
translation.zh:
‎他正在让我成为一个
‎站得正直的公民

translation.en: Alright, comedian, I'll see ya Thursday. I'll be with you in two seconds.
translation.zh: ‎好的 喜剧演员 我们周四见 ‎两秒后我和你见面

translation.en: So, you're how I landed my new client.
translation.zh: ‎所以我是靠你找到新客户的

translation.en: -Told you I wouldn't forget. -[chuckles]
Tossed business your way. Surprised?
Nick is surprising.
Doctor said, my dancing days are over.
translation.zh: ‎医生说 我的舞台生涯结束了

translation.en: Nick said, hogwash.
Nick donates his time here
for the old folks like me that can't afford PT.
translation.zh:
‎为了像我这样
‎负担不起物理治疗的老家伙

translation.en: He's a good egg. Like you.
And two good eggs make an omelet.
-Donna. -[stutters]
Okay. So what do we got?
Just a few things for you to sign.
It's just the bottom there.
Cool. Oh, guess what?
-What? -[Nick] Tomorrow's it.
My one thousandth date.
-Well. -[Nick] Yeah.
-Congratulations. -Thank you.
So, show me her profile.
-For my date? -[Susan] Yes.
-I don't think that's such a good idea. -Why not?
translation.zh:
‎-我觉得这不是个好主意
‎-为什么？

translation.en: -I don't know, weird. -It's for the case.
translation.zh:
‎-我不知道 奇怪
‎-为了官司

translation.en: -For the case? -[Susan] Sure.
Sure. Okay, well...
Here.
-Here? Okay. -Press down.
-Pam. -[Nick] Mm-hm.
[Susan] Pam is 32,
she is a fifth grade teacher, she enjoys hiking and gardening.
translation.zh: ‎她是五年级老师 喜欢远足和园艺

translation.en: She seems adorable.
Adorable is a number one red flag.
Anything that sounds too good to be true on the internet is a lie.
translation.zh:
‎网上任何好得难以置信的东西
‎都是谎言

translation.en: I have noticed that.
Yeah, well, wish me luck.
Hardly seems appropriate.
Right.
-'Cause the case. -Right.
I don't do sugar, vinegar, dairy, gluten, seeds, or nightshades.
translation.zh:
‎我不吃糖 醋 奶制品
‎谷蛋白 瓜子或茄科蔬菜

translation.en: Get you a drink while you wait?
Glass of Pinot, please.
Does the pecan-crusted tuna have nuts in it?
translation.zh: ‎碧根果金枪鱼里面含坚果吗？

translation.en: It's crusted in pecans.
Right.
[whispering] Better bring the whole bottle.
Damn it.
Seriously, could this menu have more shellfish on it?
translation.zh:
‎说真的 这个菜单敢不敢
‎再多放一些贝壳类的菜？

translation.en: If I even eat one mollusk I'll be covered in eczema like the Elephant Man.
translation.zh:
‎哪怕只吃了一个软体动物
‎我也会像象人一样全身长满湿疹

translation.en: Did you... hear the one about the greedy clam?
He was a little shellfish.
A little shellfish.
Good evening.
For how many?
Shocker.
The teriyaki chicken would be nice, if I brought my Epi-pen.
translation.zh:
‎照烧鸡应该不错
‎如果我带了过敏注射笔来

translation.en: Which I didn't.
Okay, well, look me up on LinkedIn.
Hey. I know you.
Susan!
[Susan] Hey!
No! Oh, God, no.
[man 3] Susan!
Susan!
Yes, it's me! Shhh.
It's Susan, everybody. We used to date.
translation.zh: ‎是苏珊 各位 我们曾经约会过

translation.en: I know.
-[woman 1] Watch it! -[man 3]May I...
purchase you a drink?
What are you doing here? Aren't you supposed to be fasting?
translation.zh:
‎你在这里干什么？
‎你不是应该断食的吗？

translation.en: [whispering] It's my eating window.
Smells like your drinking window.
It's a bit of that, too. You know.
No!
[Susan whispering] Can you listen to me?
You need a sandwich and a nap!
Up on three. One, two...
Maybe I'll slide into your DMs later.
-Gross. -Hmm.
-[woman] Who's that? -That is my lawyer.
I mean, these women, they could be subpoenaed.
translation.zh:
‎我是说 这些女人
‎她们可能会被传讯

translation.en: I had to make sure that you weren't intentionally tanking the dates.
translation.zh: ‎我得确保你不是故意搞砸这些约会

translation.en: -You were spying on me. -[Susan] No!
-Yeah, you were. -No!
A little. Professionally.
-"Professionally." -[Susan] I'm sorry I ruined your date.
translation.zh:
‎-“专业的”
‎-抱歉 我毁了你的约会 是吗？

translation.en: -It's okay, it was terrible. -[Susan chuckles]
It really was. She knows.
-You work fast, Nick. -[Susan] No, I'm not a...
translation.zh:
‎-你效率很高 尼克
‎-不 我不是…

translation.en: Oh, never mind.
What can I get you?
Oh, I'm fine.
-Thank you. -Please.
I'm starving.
One second.
Yes. Coral burger and fries. Thank you.
translation.zh: ‎是的 珊瑚汉堡和炸薯条 谢谢

translation.en: -That's it? -Yeah.
No special requests?
Extra mayo.
I like this one.
This is where it all happens.
Oh, yeah, this is my lucky table.
Is it, though?
Actually, no. [chuckles]
This thing is cursed. Let's go sit somewhere else.
translation.zh: ‎这桌子被诅咒了 我们坐其他地方去

translation.en: -Let's go. -[Nick] Yeah.
The only thing I ever wanted to do was play ball.
But then I slid into home, tore my ACL.
translation.zh: ‎但然后我滑到本垒 前交叉韧带撕裂

translation.en: You know, it's funny
that your whole life can just change in the blink of an eye.
That's terrible, I'm sorry.
Only thing that got me through it was my PT, Rasheed.
translation.zh:
‎唯一帮我度过难关的
‎是我的物理理疗师拉希德

translation.en: -[Susan] Hm. -This dude was so funny.
He just really inspired me to do the hard work to heal, you know?
translation.zh:
‎他真的激励我
‎去做艰苦的工作来治愈自己

translation.en: Nice.
And so I decided to become a PT myself.
translation.zh: ‎所以我决定自己成为物理理疗师

translation.en: Do the same thing.
-[Susan] Inspire through humor. -No, I'm mean. I yell a lot.
translation.zh: ‎通过幽默获得灵感 ‎不 我很刻薄 我大吼大叫

translation.en: What about you? I bet you were
-the kid crusader for justice. -[Susan] What?
Busting rigged hide-and-go-seek games around the neighborhood.
translation.zh: ‎将社区里不公平的捉迷藏游戏终极

translation.en: [Susan whispering] How'd you know they were rigged?
No, I suppose you're right. Yeah.
translation.zh: ‎不 我觉得你说的对 没错

translation.en: I do feel like there's something
hardwired in me from birth, to want to just
translation.zh: ‎自打我出生就固定下来 我就想

translation.en: fight for the little guy.
One time when I was really little, my parents took me to see The Fugitive.
translation.zh: ‎我很小的时候有一次 ‎我父母带我去看电影《亡命天涯》

translation.en: And I got so upset
that they convicted an innocent man. I'm still upset.
translation.zh:
‎他们给一个无辜的人定罪
‎我现在还是很伤心

translation.en: But I had to go wait in the lobby. Couldn't take it.
translation.zh: ‎但我必须去大厅里等 无法忍受

translation.en: You serious?
My dad tried to get me to come back into the theater, but I wouldn't.
translation.zh: ‎我爸爸想让我回到影厅 但我做不到

translation.en: Still haven't seen the end of that movie.
translation.zh: ‎所以我到现在还没看过结局

translation.en: -You didn't see The Fugitive? -[Susan] No.
You never saw the One-Armed Man?
If that's a reference to The Fugitive, no.
translation.zh: ‎如果是《亡命天涯》里面的 没有

translation.en: Before the trial is over,
we are watching The Fugitive together, okay?
It's a date.
But... also not.
-I know what you meant. Yeah. -[Susan] You get it.
translation.zh:
‎-我明白你的意思 对
‎-你懂了

translation.en: Great. [chuckles]
Actually...
this is the best dinner I've had in a really long time.
translation.zh:
‎很长一段时间以来
‎这是我吃过最棒的晚餐

translation.en: Same.
[Nick] So... you know all about my love life.
translation.zh: ‎所以我的全部爱情生活你都了解了

translation.en: Why don't you tell me about yours?
-There's nothing much to tell. -I find that hard to believe.
translation.zh: ‎没什么好说的 ‎我觉得你这话不可信

translation.en: Well, I'm running a business.
It's a lot. I just don't have time for a relationship right now.
translation.zh:
‎很多事情 我现在就是没时间
‎维持一段关系

translation.en: Someday, you know, I will. Just not today.
translation.zh:
‎总有一天我会的
‎但不是今天

translation.en: There had to be someone.
Of course there was someone.
Sure, back in law school. His name was Josh.
translation.zh: ‎当然 法学院的时候 他叫乔什

translation.en: We thought we were gonna get married, have kids, dogs, whole thing, but...
translation.zh:
‎我们以为会结婚
‎有小孩 养狗 所有的事 但…

translation.en: I don't know, he had other plans.
translation.zh: ‎我不知道 他有其他计划

translation.en: What kind of plans?
Just the kind that did not include me. [chuckles]
Seriously, how far did you park?
translation.zh: ‎说真的 你的车停的有多远？

translation.en: Okay, valet at Coral? Twelve dollars? It's highway robbery.
translation.zh:
‎好的 珊瑚餐厅的代客泊车？
‎12美元？简直是拦路抢劫

translation.en: Right.
So this is yours?
Yep, this is Zorro.
-Nice, Zorro, that's sweet. -Sweet?
translation.zh:
‎-很好 佐罗 好甜蜜
‎-甜蜜？

translation.en: No, Zorro is a vigilante who tracks down ruthless villains.
translation.zh: ‎不 佐罗是打击残忍坏蛋的义侠

translation.en: -A lot tougher than she looks, huh? -Yeah.
-Let me get that for you. -Oh, no, I got it.
translation.zh:
‎-我帮你开门吧
‎-不用 我自己搞定

translation.en: [Nick] Literally got it.
-[clears throat] -Well, you are full of surprises.
So are you.
-Handshake. -[Nick] Yeah.
It's my signature end-of-the-date move.
translation.zh: ‎这是我结束约会的标志性动作

translation.en: It's my way of saying goodbye, good luck, have a nice life.
translation.zh:
‎这是我表达再见 祝你好运
‎生活愉快的方式

translation.en: So it's an efficient transaction.
[Nick] Yes, it is.
So, tell me, if you were going to name tonight
translation.zh:
‎那么告诉我
‎如果你会按照《老友记》剧名的风格

translation.en: like an episode of Friends, what would my title be?
translation.zh:
‎给今晚的约会命名
‎你会给我按什么头衔？

translation.en: "The one I didn't see coming."
Night.
Night, Susan.
-[Nick] What's that noise in your car? -Oh, it's Tiffany.
translation.zh:
‎-你车上那是谁的歌？
‎-哦 是蒂芙尼

translation.en: -Tiffany? -Yeah.
No idea what that is.
What?
Tiffany, she was like one of the biggest singers in the 1980s.
translation.zh:
‎蒂芙尼 她是80年代
‎最大牌的歌手之一

translation.en: -Oh, Tiffany Tiffany. -Yes, Tiffany.
translation.zh:
‎-哦 那个蒂芙尼啊
‎-没错 蒂芙尼

translation.en: Yeah, still don't know. I have no clue.
translation.zh: ‎对 还是不知道 我毫无头绪

translation.en: You must have, it's so--
Are you kidding? I can't tell.
Possibly.
Good night, Nick.
Good night, Tiffany.
Ms. Kapoor, you can call your own exterminator.
translation.zh: ‎卡普尔小姐 你可以自己叫灭虫员

translation.en: Yes, absolutely.
Tenant law stipulates that you're entitled to a pest-free apartment.
translation.zh:
‎房客法规定
‎你有权住一间没有害虫的公寓内

translation.en: Absolute--
Okay. Well let me know how it goes, Ms. K.
translation.zh: ‎好的 让我知道进展 卡小姐

translation.en: Thank you.
Roberto, there is this concept called knocking.
translation.zh: ‎罗伯托 有种概念叫做敲门

translation.en: -You make a fist, you pull it back-- -Okay, fine.
translation.zh:

Keep it close.
Oh... cozy.

Yes, when you're trying not to laugh you make a sound kind of like... [snorts] I don't--

‎-这个声音一点不像我

translation.en: -[Nick] Nope. -[Susan] We'll see.
Ms. Whitaker.
-Bill Jones. -My client, Nick Evans.

‎-我的客户 尼克·埃文斯

Right.
We're ready for her.
Tashi delek. Jug rog nang. Tibetan greeting. Namaste.

‎-我们很好
‎-弥迦 给他们端水

translation.en: -All right. -[Tamara sighs]
I was shocked and disappointed to hear that

translation.en: you brought a complaint against Love Guaranteed.
Well, per the Deceptive Trade Practices Act,
corporations are barred from engaging in
misrepresentation, bait-and-switch advertising,
and other fraudulent behaviors to promote their products,

‎惠特克小姐
‎你去过西藏的班公错吗？

translation.en: No.
It is a transformative place.
I went on a two-month, barefoot walkabout through the high grasslands,

translation.en: asking myself, "What is my purpose on Earth?"

‎有一天 一只寂寞的小鸟
‎从空中俯冲而过

translation.zh:
‎我的内心深处感到了孤独
‎我开始思考

translation.en: -"I will solve loneliness." -[Nick snorts]
My website brings much needed hope, love, connection, joy,

translation.en: happiness, life to the masses.

Everyone here knows that that language is legally binding.

‎这种语言是有法律约束力的

translation.en: So.
We have a case. You all know it. What are you offering?

Well, we have a very generous settlement to offer.

‎我们可以提供一个
‎非常丰厚的和解条件

translation.en: One hundred thousand dollars, with a signed non-disclosure agreement.

One hundred thousand dollars wouldn't even begin to cover the expenses

We request five hundred thousand in restitution,

‎你们公司还要承诺
‎从网站和广告中撤下

translation.en: from its website and advertising,

translation.en: and I would also obviously need to review any NDA before my client can sign it.

‎而且很明显在我的客户

translation.en: [scoffs] I'm sorry, this isn't a negotiation.
We've looked into you, Ms. Whitaker, and we see that

‎你热心的精品小律所举步维艰

translation.en: This little do-gooder,

‎正义卫士的态度

I, well... [scuffs]
Luckily, we are not here to talk about me.

‎幸运的是
‎我们在这里不是谈我的情况

[Bill] Then take the settlement.

-Nick, no! -Because she's the opposite of you.

‎-尼克 不要
‎-因为她和你正好相反

She has character and principles,

-Thank you. -[Tamara] Hmm.
Well, I have a billion dollar empire to run,

translation.en: No deal.
We will see you in court,
where we will request one million dollars in punitive damages.

it's Heraclitus, not Buddha.

Boom.
The water is gross.
[Susan whispers] Are they staring at us?
Yep, all of them.
-[Susan] Should've taken the stairs. -[Nick] Yep.

‎不管怎么样
‎谁想出恋爱保证这个愚蠢的主意的？

translation.en: -Who am I firing today? -[Bill] Uh...
Yours.
Micah, you're fired.
-That was awesome. -If Tamara Taylor thinks

‎她应该再想想

-Another thing coming. -No, it's think, like,

‎-再考虑
‎-不 想想 就是

Ha! No, it's thing.

For standing up for me in there. That really meant a lot.

‎真的对我意义重大

Charles Gilbert, Seattle Courier.

‎-是的

‎-大家都喜欢
‎-大多数人都喜欢

Hi, you must be Susan.
I'm Arianna.

Nick Evans.

So you didn't keep in touch?

My fault. It didn't end well.
Radio silence ever since.

For the case, of course.
Of course.
I'll just show myself out.
Kitchen.

[Nick sighs] Hello?

‎-显然没有

‎要给你探讨几件事

translation.en: To go over-- Wait, you're still at work?

translation.en: So?
You are not a normal human being.
Fine, what about tomorrow then?
[Nick] Tomorrow's Saturday.
What's your point?
[Nick] My point is it's Saturday.
[Susan] The one who ate paper.
-[Nick] Yeah. All kinds. -[Susan] What?
-[Susan] No. -[Nick] Yep. Napkins, toilet paper.
translation.zh:
‎-不
‎-是的 餐巾纸 厕纸

translation.en: -[Nick] Playing cards. -[Susan] No.
[Nick] Not kidding. Origami...
[Susan] I don't believe you,

translation.zh:
‎但我很期待
‎和这个可能是虚构的人见面

translation.en: You know, you're not the cheesy swindler I had you pegged for.

translation.en: -Oh, yeah? -[Susan] Mm-mm.
You're not the uptight lawyer I assumed you were.

‎你也不是我以为的
‎那种脾气不好的律师

translation.en: Happy to be wrong for once.
Wrong? Okay.
-Just enjoying that, sorry. -Yeah, well...
translation.zh:
‎-就享受其中吧 抱歉
‎-嗯 那么…

translation.en: But you might be a little bit right.

translation.en: Oh, yeah?
The first thing I do when I wake up in the morning is check my phone.

-What? -It's a "vicious cycle."

‎-是这么说的
‎-不 是恶性周期

geometry teacher's rock band...
The Vicious Circle!

‎她告诉我的
‎她说她有一个想象中的朋友

Kinda need to talk to you about something.
I met with Arianna.
As soon as I realized your relationship predated our case,

‎但我意识到
‎你们的关系在我们官司之前

Okay? But you don't need me

I'm sorry.
Uh... fiancée.

‎当我在工作的时候

Yeah, it turns out she was seeing someone else.

So... yeah.
-[woman screams] -Melanie!

‎-一切都好

‎-很高兴见到你

‎-不 我没有

We're leasing.

You'd think we hadn't done this birthing thing before, huh?

Remember our deal? You be good for Auntie Suze.

My contractions are five minutes apart, if we don't leave now,

Oh, we haven't met yet. Hi, I'm Gideon, nice--

-Go! -Here we go.
-[Melanie] Bye! -Bye, guys.
-[Melanie] Be good! -Take pictures.
Or... don't.
-Ooh, it's exciting. -That was... yeah.
I always thought I'd be at work when D-Day finally came.

‎我就是一直觉得登陆日最终来时
‎我应该在上班

translation.en: You know I can stick around and help out.
Oh, no. You have no idea what you'd be signing up for.

‎自己惹上了什么麻烦

translation.en: -Him? -[Susan] Mm-hm.
Piece of cake.
Yeah!
What happened?
Yeah! [chuckles]
He was like one of those Von Trapp kids and now it's all Hunger Games.

‎他刚才还像是冯·特拉普家的孩子

-[Susan] Oliver. -What?
Oliver, we need to open a window of negotiation about bedtime.

translation.en: Are you lawyering a four-year-old?
translation.zh:
‎你在用律师的口气
‎和四岁小朋友说话？

translation.en: I am willing to make concessions.
-[Oliver screaming] -All right, I'll be right back.
Okay.
What do you want? Just what do you want?

‎你想要干吗？
‎你就说你想要干吗？

translation.en: Alright, who wants ice cream?
-Me! -[Nick] All right.
Ice cream coming up, but first lay down, in bed, now.

‎但首先躺到床上去

translation.en: Let's go.
Here.
Enjoy.
Voilà.
That's all it took, all this time?
Yeah, it's bribery. It's the oldest trick in history.

‎对 这是贿赂
‎历史上最古老的招数

translation.en: -Night, kid. -Night!
Oh, my goodness. Next time, I'm bringing holy water.

translation.en: [sighs] It's Gideon.
"Baby Amelia is here.
Seven pounds, two ounces. Mom and baby are resting.
-Dad needs alcohol." -Wow!
-Look at that. -[Susan sighs]
That's incredible, isn't it?
How much your life can just change in a moment?

translation.en: Yeah.
I better go.
Yeah, I have early PT in the morning.

‎嗯 我明早很早
‎有个物理康复治疗要做

translation.en: -So... -Hm.
Special place, isn't it?
Oh, yeah. Yeah.
And once we win the case, it's gonna be even better.
translation.zh: ‎一旦我们赢了官司 就会更好了

translation.en: How so?
Well I'm donating any proceeds from the lawsuit towards a...
new children's wing.
You'd be surprised how many little kids we get in there.

translation.en: You never told me that.
You never asked.
I'm sorry I judged you.
Don't be. I judged you too.

translation.en: Pumpkin spice latte?
I had fun tonight.
I did, too.
-Hey. Give me a hug. -[Susan chuckles]
-We can hug. -Right?
-Yeah. -Mm-hm.
You don't smell like a lawyer.
Good night, Susan.
Night.
She's MIA. She's never MIA.

‎她在执行任务时失踪了

‎那宝宝根本不是客户
‎今天她还迟到？

I want to see her name on buses by noon.

translation.en: -Is she choking? -I think that was a giggle.

‎-她喘不上气吗？
‎-我觉得那是傻笑

‎她听起来就像是

-How are you feeling? -[Susan sighs]

No, this is fresh.
You're such a dear.
Well, back to the salt mines.

translation.en: -I can smell it on you. -Shut up.
S. Whitaker and Associates.
Hold, please.
[whispering] It's Bill Jones!
-Oh, hey, you. -Okay.

Okay.

Bye.

Does anyone?

Looks like I sunk.

Blessings.
Check out my lifestyle blog.
Hi.

My client, Nicholas Evans,

Nicholas Evans

translation.en: This lawsuit isn't about trade practices or false advertising. No.

translation.zh: ‎现在证据将显示尼克·埃文斯

had no intention of finding love again.
Sure, Mr. Evans may have been on a thousand dates.

And how did the date go?
Nick asked all about me.
First time that's ever happened on an internet date.
Am I right, ladies?
Did you ever feel like Nick was just going through the motions?

translation.en: -Uh... No, he was really nice. -Thank you.

‎-没有 他人真的很好
‎-谢谢

translation.en: -[screaming] Yes! -Baby girl!

Nick insisted on paying the bill, walked me to my car,

‎尼克坚持他来付钱

translation.en: Thank you for your time today.
Defendant's witness.
Come on.
You expect us to believe Mr. Out For A Quick Buck
translation.zh:
‎你指望我们相信
‎出来赚快钱先生

translation.en: didn't intentionally throw the date?
No, like I said. Perfect gentleman.

translation.en: No, how it goes is Nick Evans had zero intention of finding love,

‎不 问题是尼克·埃文斯
‎无意寻找真爱

translation.en: -and he manufactured-- -Objection, Your Honor.

‎-反对 法官大人

translation.en: [judge] Sustained.
[witness] Actually, can I answer?
Nick and I went on one date.
It's impossible to say what was in his heart.
But I hope he does find love one day. He deserves it.

‎但我希望他有一天能找到真爱
‎因为他值得拥有

translation.en: We all do.
No further questions.
He's coming off like a saint in there, what is your plan?
translation.zh:
‎他表现地就像个圣人
‎你的计划是什么？

translation.en: -Don't worry. -Don't touch me!
Okay.
Tomorrow, we're going to tear apart Nick's character and motivation
translation.zh:
‎明天我们将通过深入研究
‎他的人际关系

translation.en: by delving into his relationships.
Both past and present.
[woman] Look, they're coming!
Ms. Taylor, can I get a statement for Rise and Shine Seattle?
translation.zh:
‎泰勒小姐
‎我是《闪亮西雅图》的记者 ‎你有话要说吗？

translation.en: Yeah, it's a silly lawsuit.
We are still the best dating website you can subscribe to.
translation.zh:
‎我们依然是你们可以注册的
‎最佳约会网站

translation.en: Check out my lifestyle blog for today's tips.
translation.zh:
‎请访问我的生活方式博客
‎查看今日小点子

translation.en: No gluten, no dairy, no wheat, no sugar, no...
translation.zh:
‎不含麸质 不含乳制品
‎不含小麦 不含糖 不含…

translation.en: Kicking ass, taking names, and looking fierce the entire time.

‎狠揍对方 点名
‎全程看起来很凶

translation.en: Check, check, check.
[Susan] I don't know.
I just can't let Bill Jones ruin Nick's reputation.
translation.zh:
‎我就是不能让比尔·琼斯
‎毁了尼克的名声

translation.en: Hold on.
-Hold on? -To what?
[Susan] Nick!
Hi.
Listen, I...
I have an idea. It's a little unorthodox, but...

Why?
[Susan] She's being called either way.
It's better that we manage her testimony rather than react to it.

‎我们最好掌控她的证词

translation.en: So we take the wind out of Love Guaranteed's sails.

translation.en: You're an honorable guy, Nick, and that's gonna come through.

‎你是个值得尊敬的人
‎尼克 你会撑过去的

translation.en: Thank you.
Susan...
I'll see you tomorrow.
I hate you, Tiffany!

‎-好的 律师

[whispering] This isn't fair.
Thank you, Your Honor.
The plaintiff calls Ms. Arianna Silver to the stand.
translation.zh: ‎原告传唤阿丽安娜·西尔弗上庭

translation.en: Do you swear to tell the truth, the whole truth and nothing but the truth?
translation.zh:
‎你发誓提供的证据属实
‎并且完全真实 唯有真实？

translation.en: I do.
Ms. Silver, how did you know Mr. Evans?
translation.zh:
‎西尔弗小姐
‎你是怎么认识埃文斯先生的？

translation.en: He's my ex-fiance.
And for the question on everyone's mind.
What happened?
I left him.
For someone else.
I'm getting married next month.
[Susan] Congratulations.
To put it plainly, Ms. Silver,
It is my presumption that the defense named you as a witness in hopes
translation.zh: ‎我假设是辩方把你列为证人是希望

translation.en: to reflect negatively on Mr. Evans' character.
translation.zh:
‎你能提供证据
‎显示埃文斯先生个性中不好的一面

translation.en: When I spoke to Mr. Jones,
about being a witness, I did mention that I thought
translation.zh: ‎关于出庭作证 我的确提到我觉得

translation.en: Nick was licking his wounds.
I mean, a thousand dates and you couldn't find someone new?
translation.zh:
‎我是说 1000次约会
‎你找不到新的对象？

translation.en: [sighs] Seemed a little fishy to me.
And do you still feel the same way?
Actually, no.
Nick is a great guy.
He's all about being honest.
So I assume that this lawsuit is on the up and up.
translation.zh:
‎所以我认为
‎这次诉讼建立在诚实真诚上

translation.en: I only wish him well.
[Susan] Thank you for your time, Ms. Silver.
translation.zh: ‎谢谢你抽出时间前来 西尔弗小姐

translation.en: Defendant's witness.
No questions.
[judge] If there are no questions,
then the witness can be excused.
And we'll take a 15-minute recess
before the plaintiff takes the stand.
[Nick] Arianna?
I just want to thank you.
I'm sorry how things ended with us.
translation.zh: ‎抱歉我们两个的事是这样的结局

translation.en: It's my fault.
[sighs] I'm not proud of it,
but I did learn from it.
I'm with the right person now.
I'm happy for you.
I'm happy for you too.
-What are you talking about? -[Arianna] I know that look.
translation.zh:
‎-你在说什么？
‎-我知道那种眼神

translation.en: You're in love with your lawyer.
I just hope you can admit it to yourself, before it's too late.
translation.zh:
‎我就是希望在一切都太迟以前
‎你要对自己承认这一点

translation.en: But what if she doesn't feel the same way?
What if I get hurt again?
There are no guarantees in love, Nick.
Isn't that what this is all about?
[bailiff] Do you swear to tell the truth, the whole truth and nothing but the truth?
translation.zh:
‎你发誓提供的证据属实
‎并且完全真实 唯有真实？

translation.en: I do.
[Susan] Mr. Evans,
in your own words, please,
tell the court how Love Guaranteed deceived and damaged you
translation.zh: ‎告诉法庭恋爱保证是如何用虚假承诺

translation.en: with their false promises.
[whispering] Just say whatever comes to mind.
When I started this whole thing,
I was out for justice.
Love isn't something you can just guarantee.
Like a pizza delivery.
[whispering] I'm sorry, what are you doing?
Love is unpredictable.
And it can burn you.
But it can also surprise you
in the most remarkable ways.
It turns out I did find love,
when I fell in love with my lawyer.
Ms. Whitaker herself said she subscribed to Love Guaranteed.
translation.zh:
‎惠特克小姐自己说过
‎她注册了恋爱保证

translation.en: If Nick Evans is in love with her,
this lawsuit has to be dismissed.
Folks, we must have order in the courtroom.
There's no need for dismissal, Your Honor.
I'm dropping the lawsuit.
Mr. Jones is right.
While I didn't meet Susan through the site, I met her because of it.
translation.zh:
‎我没有通过这个网站认识苏珊
‎但我因为这个网站认识了她

translation.en: And I promised to tell the truth under oath, so...
I'd much rather have love in my life than win here in court today.
translation.zh:
‎比起今天在法庭上赢
‎我更愿意在生活中有爱

translation.en: It's an amazing thing when you find someone who gets you.
translation.zh: ‎找到一个懂你 你也懂她的人

translation.en: And you get them in return.
Even when they're right and you're wrong.
translation.zh: ‎哪怕她们是对的 你是错的

translation.en: Turns out the saying is, "You've got another think coming."
-[chuckles] -[Nick] It really is, I Googled it. Weird.
translation.zh: ‎真的是这样 我上网查了 奇怪

translation.en: A wise old man once told me to dive in, so...
translation.zh:
‎一位有智慧的老人
‎曾经告诉我要深潜下去 所以…

translation.en: here it goes.
What I realized,
that I don't want a guarantee.
Or a safety net.
All I want...
is to take a chance with you.
It's not a risk to fall in love.
It's a risk not to.
I love you, Susan.
Do you love me too?
Ms. Whitaker, answer that question.
I do!
I give you all the credit, I do.
translation.zh: ‎我把一切功劳都归功于你 真的

translation.en: -I'm so proud of you. -My man!
translation.zh:
‎-我为你感到非常自豪
‎-我的兄弟

translation.en: -You smell like wine. -A little bit.
-Ms. Whitaker? -[Susan] Yes.
Ms. Taylor would like a word with you. Please.
When I studied with my Lama in Tibet, he said,
translation.zh: ‎我在西藏跟喇嘛学习的时候 他说

translation.en: "The thousand brilliant accomplishments of the past do not serve today's purpose."
translation.zh:
‎“过去的几千个辉煌成就
‎无法再为今天的目的服务”

translation.en: -I'm sorry, I'm not following. -[Tamara] I'll pay your legal fees,
translation.zh:
‎抱歉 我没听懂 ‎我会支付你的法律费用
‎我还会捐25万到你的医院

translation.en: and I'll donate 250 thousand to your hospital,
translation.zh:
‎我会支付你的法律费用
‎我还会捐25万到你的医院

translation.en: if you two become the new face of Love Guaranteed.
translation.zh:
‎只要你们两个成为
‎恋爱保证网站的新面孔

translation.en: -Why would you do that? -An old-fashioned love story
translation.zh: ‎你为什么要这么做？ ‎一个老套的爱情故事

translation.en: complete with a romantic courtroom confession?
translation.zh: ‎完成了一个浪漫的法庭认罪？

translation.en: People love that crap.
I mean...
It's gonna make me look so good on social media. It's not hard...
translation.zh:
‎这能让我在社交媒体上形象良好
‎不难 但是…

translation.en: It's much better than the fake poster couple we have now.
translation.zh:
‎这比我们现在看到的
‎海报上的假情侣好多了

translation.en: I knew it!
Brad and Veronica.
-He did, he called that. Hm-- -I called that.
translation.zh:
‎-他看穿了 他就是那么称呼他们的
‎-我就那样称呼

translation.en: Two hundred and fifty thousand for the hospital. That's a lot,
translation.zh:
‎对于这家医院来说 ‎25万是一大笔钱
‎但我们追求的损失费是100万

translation.en: but we were seeking a million in damages.
translation.zh:
‎25万是一大笔钱
‎但我们追求的损失费是100万

translation.en: And let's face it, we could've had it, so...
translation.zh:
‎让我们面对吧
‎我们本来能拥有的 所以…

translation.en: But you didn't.
-We could've though. -How about 500 thousand?
translation.zh:
‎-不过我们本来可以的
‎-50万怎么样？

translation.en: Deal.
-Wow. -[Susan chuckles]
The jury still out on whether a dating site can guarantee love.
translation.zh:
‎陪审团还在讨论
‎约会网站是否能保证爱情

translation.en: But love guarantees a happy ending.
translation.zh: ‎但恋爱保证有了一个美满结局

translation.en: So what do we do now? Go on an official first date?
translation.zh:
‎那么现在我们怎么办？
‎进行第一次正式约会？

translation.en: Anything but a first date.
translation.zh: ‎除了第一次约会 干什么都行

translation.en: ♪ Children behave ♪
translation.zh:
‎（免责声明：爱是无法保证的） ‎（副作用可能包括
‎心痛 易怒 压力 紧张）

translation.en: ♪ That's what they say When we're together ♪
translation.zh:
‎（副作用可能包括
‎心痛 易怒 压力 紧张） ‎（偎依 睡眠不佳 眩晕
‎兴高采烈 分享炸薯条）

translation.en: ♪ And watch how you play ♪
translation.zh:
‎（通货紧缩 体重增加 说孩子气的话
‎生孩子 突然的情绪变化）

translation.en: ♪ They don't understand ♪
translation.zh:
‎（在对方亲戚家度假
‎睡沙发 游戏之夜）

translation.en: ♪ And so we're running Just as fast as we can ♪
translation.zh:
‎（在对方亲戚家度假
‎睡沙发 游戏之夜） ‎（温暖的感觉 金融危机
‎夏威夷 亲吻脖子…）
